message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our product to you. This extraordinary item holds significant value to us, but we understand its potential worth to you is even greater. We are offering this unique opportunity to acquire it at a special price of $1,200,000. We believe this offers an excellent balance between fair compensation for us and a favorable deal for you. We look forward to discussing this further with you.

Alice, your offer is appreciated, but I'm looking to pay closer to $1,000,000.  This would still be a significant profit for you and a great deal for me.  I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We appreciate your interest in our product and understand your perspective. After careful consideration, we are willing to negotiate closer to your suggested price. Our revised offer for the product is $1,100,000. We hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations while still providing a substantial return for us.
